title: 1987 Ferrari F40
longDescription: The Ferrari F40 was built to celebrate Ferrari’s 40th anniversary. It was the last car personally approved by Enzo Ferrari and became iconic for its raw driving experience, lightweight construction, and stunning performance. With its twin-turbocharged V8 and aggressive styling, it remains one of the most revered supercars in history.

title: 2020 Lamborghini Aventador
longDescription: The Aventador marked the end of an era for naturally aspirated V12 Lamborghinis. With jet-fighter-inspired styling and scissor doors, it delivered explosive power and aggressive dynamics. It served as Lamborghini’s flagship until the brand shifted to hybrid successors in the 2020s.

title: 2020 Audi A4
longDescription: The 2020 Audi A4 is a refined compact luxury sedan that blends premium materials, advanced tech, and sharp German engineering. With a turbocharged engine and quattro all-wheel drive available, it balances daily comfort with confident driving dynamics.

title: 2014 Lamborghini Huracan
description: The successor of the famous Gallardo
longDescription: Replacing the Gallardo, the Huracan brought a more modern, refined edge to Lamborghini's V10 lineup. With sharp styling, lightning-quick acceleration, and advanced all-wheel drive systems, it became one of Lamborghini’s best-selling models.

title: 2020 Mercedes G-Wagon
description: Luxury off-roader with powerful performance and iconic design.
longDescription: Originally designed for military use, the G-Class evolved into a luxury icon. The 2020 AMG variant pairs the boxy, rugged design with immense power and high-end comfort, making it a status symbol on and off the road.

title: 2020 BMW M3 G80
description: High-performance sports sedan with aggressive styling and turbocharged power.
longDescription: The G80 generation of the BMW M3 introduced bold styling and even bolder performance. With a twin-turbo inline-six and available all-wheel drive for the first time in M3 history, it redefined the modern performance sedan.

title: 2010 Mercedes S-Class S600
description: Flagship luxury sedan with V12 performance and ultimate comfort.
longDescription: The S600 was Mercedes-Benz’s answer to uncompromising luxury and power. With a silky V12 engine and state-of-the-art comfort features, it represented the pinnacle of German engineering for business executives and luxury connoisseurs alike.

title: 2020 Ferrari F8 Tributo
description: Track-ready supercar with breathtaking speed and aerodynamic style.
longDescription: The F8 Tributo pays homage to Ferrari’s legendary V8 lineage. Featuring the most powerful V8 ever fitted to a non-special series Ferrari, it combines beautiful design with extraordinary track and road capabilities.

title: 1995 Bugatti EB110
description: Rare AWD supercar with a quad-turbo V12 and legendary speed.
longDescription: The Bugatti EB110 was a technical marvel of the 1990s, featuring a carbon-fiber chassis, quad-turbo V12, and all-wheel drive. Despite financial struggles, it helped resurrect the Bugatti name and laid the groundwork for the Veyron years later.

title: 2005 Ford GT
description: Retro-inspired supercar reviving Ford's racing heritage.
longDescription: Inspired by the legendary GT40 that won Le Mans, the 2005 Ford GT was a limited-production halo car that brought retro design and modern engineering together. It featured a supercharged V8 and became a collector’s favorite.

title: 2007 Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution IX
description: Iconic AWD rally-bred sedan with aggressive turbo power.
longDescription: The Evo IX refined Mitsubishi’s rally dominance for the streets. With an advanced AWD system, precise handling, and tunable turbocharged engine, it became a cult icon among car enthusiasts and motorsport fans alike.

title: 2010 Mercedes-Benz C300
description: Refined German luxury with balanced performance and comfort.
longDescription: The 2010 Mercedes-Benz C300 blended executive elegance with sporty confidence. Known for its solid build quality, smooth V6 engine, and premium interior, it appealed to buyers seeking daily luxury with a touch of performance.
